metadata.title: CVE-2021-46920 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:dmaengine: idxd: Fix clobbering of SWERR overflow bit on writebackCurrent code blindly writes over the SWERR and the OVERFLOW bits. Writeback the bits actually read instead so the driver avoids clobbering theOVERFLOW bit that comes after the register is read.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.

linux-gcp package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gke: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
